programme.title: הכלב והחתולה: המרדף המטורף (מדובב)
programme.desc: קומדיה לכל המשפחה בדיבוב אמיר שורוש ("ראמזי") ומיקי מוכתר עורי. גור כלבים שבלע יהלום יקר וחתולה מפונקת נפגשים במקרה לאחר שנשכחו בשדה התעופה. כעת עליהם למצוא דרך לחזור לבעליהם, בעוד אחריהם רודף שוטר שמחפש אחר היהלום. 2024.(n)

programme.title: חלומו של דולפין (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה. סיפורו המופלא של דניאל, דולפין צעיר שחולם לשחות בגלים הגדולים שמחוץ ללגונה הקטנה שבה הוא חי. לילה אחד ניתנת לו ההזדמנות, והוא יוצא למסע קסום במרחבי הים הפתוח. במאי: אדוארדו שולדט. 2010. כ' עב'.(n)

programme.title: מוריס המדהים (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציית הרפתקאות מהיוצרים של "שרק", ע"פ ספר הילדים האהוב. חתול מטורלל בעל לב זהב, מגיע אל עיירה חדשה עם חבריו העכברים, ושני ילדים סקרנים. יחד הם נקלעים להרפתקאה מסוכנת במיוחד. דיבוב: אסף פריינטא. במאי: טובי גנקל. 2022. כ' עב'.(n)

programme.title: בלאגן על ארבע (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה מקסימה. כלבלב מפונק מוצא עצמו ברחוב לאחר שנמלט מהילדים החמדנים של בעליו הקודמים. כעת כשהוא מנסה לשרוד בעולם האמיתי, באים לעזרתו כלב רחוב קשוח ומוזיקאית צעירה. דיבוב: דן קיזלר, דקלה הדר. במאי: קווין ג'ונסון. 2019.(n)

programme.title: ביגפוט ג'וניור 2 (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציית הרפתקאות לכל המשפחה. מספר חודשים לאחר שחזר לביתו, מחליט ביגפוט לעזוב שוב את בנו אדם ולצאת להציל עמק באלסקה מתאגיד דלק אכזרי. כשהוא נעלם באורח מסתורי, יוצא אדם למסע חיפושים אחר אביו. 2020. כ' עב'.(n)

programme.title: שומרת הדרקונים (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציית הרפתקאות. קיסר מרושע שכעת שולט בסין העתיקה, כולא את הדרקונים, שהיו בעבר חברים של בני האדם. ילדה צעירה ומלאת תושייה, עוזרת לדרקון האחרון שטרם נשבה לברוח, ויחד הם מנסים להציל את שאר הדרקונים. דיבוב עב': ניר ברק. 2024.(n)

programme.title: נורם יוצא לחופשה (מדובב)
programme.desc: הרביעי בסדרת סרטי האנימציה לכל המשפחה, מיוצרי 'צעצוע של סיפור'. נורם, המלך הנערץ של דובי הקוטב יוצא עם משפחתו לחופשה חלומית בסין, שבמהרה משתבשת לאחר שהכתר שלו נעלם באופן מסתורי. דיבוב עב': לורן סביר. 2020. כ' עב'.(n)

programme.title: גנוב על המיניונים (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה. סרט ההמשך ל"גנוב על הירח". גרו מגויס הפעם לליגת האנטי-רשעים כדי להתמודד עם אויב חדש, ויוצא בעקבותיו יחד עם המיניונים המצחיקים והסוכנת לוסי. דיבוב עב': אוהד שחר, ליאת הר-לב. במאים: פייר קופין, כריס רניוד. 2013.(n)

programme.title: תולעת ספרים (מדובב)
programme.desc: הרפתקאות. עולמה של מילדרד בת ה-11 משתנה בין רגע כאשר אביה הקוסם, שמעולם לא הכירה, לוקח אותה עמו להרפתקה מופלאה בניו זילנד בחיפוש אחר פנתר אגדי בעל כוחות-על. עם: נל פישר, אלייז'ה ווד. במאית: אנט טימפסון. ארה"ב, 2024.(n)

programme.title: רובוטריקים: ההתחלה (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה מלאת אקשן, הסרט השמיני בסדרת "רובוטריקים". הסיפור שמעולם לא סופר על כיצד אופטימוס פריים ומגאטרון הפכו למנהיגי הרובוטריקים ואויבים מושבעים. דיבוב עב': אסף פריינטא, תמיר גינזבורג. במאי: ג'וש קולי. 2024.(n)

programme.title: רובין וילדי היער
programme.desc: הרפתקאה משוגעת לכל המשפחה. רובין וחבריה אוהבים לשחק במשחקי דמיון ביער שליד ביתם. כשיזמית נדל"ן מרושעת מתכננת להרוס את היער ולבנות במקומו בניינים, החבורה יעשו הכול כדי לשמור על הטבע. במאי: פיל הוקינס. אנגליה, 2024.(n)

programme.title: מיה והאריה הלבן
programme.desc: דרמת הרפתקאות לכל המשפחה. מיה בת ה-10 נאלצת לעזוב את לונדון ולעבור עם הוריה לאפריקה, שם היא מפתחת ידידות אמיצה עם גור אריות לבן ויפהפה. עם: דאניה די וילייה, מלאני לורן. במאי: ז'יל דה מייסטרה. צרפת, 2018.(n)

programme.title: The Bridge on the River Kwai
Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom
Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom
Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
True Grit
programme.desc: One-eyed, over-the-hill US Marshal Rooster Cogburn reluctantly agrees to help a girl track down her father's killer. The quest is complicated by a Texas Ranger, who is also on the murderer's trail, and a host of villains who have few qualms about disposing of the meddling youngster and her protector. Western, starring an Oscar-winning John Wayne alongside Jeff Corey, Kim Darby, Glen Campbell, Robert Duvall and Dennis Hopper.(n)

programme.title: Lee
programme.desc: American fashion model-turned-war photographer Lee Miller is determined to document the truth of the Nazi regime, and in spite of the odds stacked against female correspondents, she captures some of the most important images of the Second World War. Fact-based drama, starring Kate Winslet, Andy Samberg, Alexander Skarsgard and Marion Cotillard.(n)

programme.title: The Boy in the Striped Pyjamas
programme.desc: Bruno, a boy in Nazi Germany, moves to the country when his father is placed in charge of a concentration camp. While exploring the woods close to the facility's boundary, he spots a Jewish youngster being held there, and the two become friends - but Bruno remains innocently oblivious to the camp's true purpose. Drama, starring David Thewlis, Asa Butterfield and Jack Scanlon.(n)

programme.title: Schindler's List
programme.desc: In German-occupied Poland during the Second World War, businessman and Nazi Party member Oskar Schindler is deeply affected when he witnesses the clearing of the Krakow Ghetto. He decides to try to save Jews destined for the concentration camps by employing them in his factory - an act of mercy made possible by a deal struck with a sadistic German commandant. Steven Spielberg's Oscar-winning drama, starring Liam Neeson, Ben Kingsley and Ralph Fiennes.(n)

programme.title: There Will Be Blood
programme.desc: An oil prospector presents the public image of a caring family man while nurturing a murderous ambition to seize control of land and wealth at any cost. But his insatiable greed leads to a violent conflict with a young priest who is also intent on using the people and resources of an oil-rich town for his own ends. Paul Thomas Anderson's historical drama, starring an Oscar-winning Daniel Day-Lewis, with Paul Dano and Dillon Freasier.(n)

programme.title: Dreamgirls
programme.desc: A 1960s singing trio are chosen to perform backing vocals for a popular performer - an event that launches the band on a successful career of their own. However, when the most attractive of the girls is picked as the face of the group, edging out the other two, personal rivalries begin to jeopardise their friendship. Musical drama, inspired by the rise to fame of Diana Ross and the Supremes, and starring Jamie Foxx, Beyonce Knowles, Eddie Murphy and an Oscar-winning Jennifer Hudson.(n)

programme.title: Grease
programme.desc: Rebellious American teenager Danny falls for innocent Australian girl Sandy during the summer holidays, but when he later finds out she is a new student at his school, he risks losing her love by trying to act cool in front of his friends. Romantic musical set in the 1950s, starring John Travolta, Olivia Newton-John, Stockard Channing, Jeff Conaway, Didi Conn and Sid Caesar.(n)

programme.title: Grease 2
programme.desc: A shy English boy joins the senior class at Rydell High and immediately falls for the leader of the Pink Ladies. But she is only interested in tough guys, forcing him to adopt a dual identity as a mysterious biker. Musical sequel, starring Michelle Pfeiffer, Maxwell Caulfield, Lorna Luft, Eve Arden and Sid Caesar, with Didi Conn reprising her role as Frenchy from the original film.(n)

programme.title: Scent of a Woman
programme.desc: A blind, hard-drinking war veteran pays a timid college student to accompany him on a weekend break in the big city, where he plans to make the most of life. However, the youngster is shocked to learn that at the end of their trip, his new friend plans to kill himself. Comedy drama, starring an Oscar-winning Al Pacino, Chris O'Donnell, Gabrielle Anwar and Philip Seymour Hoffman.(n)

programme.title: Flashdance
programme.desc: A determined factory welder leads a double life as an exotic dancer by night. Her real ambition is to become a ballet star, and with the support of her boss and an instructor, she sets out to realise her dreams. Drama, with Jennifer Beals, Michael Nouri, Lilia Skala, Sunny Johnson, Kyle T Heffner and Lee Ving.(n)

programme.title: Dear John
programme.desc: A soldier falls in love with a student he meets while on two weeks' leave, and he promises to seek her out after completing his tour of duty. However, in the aftermath of the September 11 attacks, he decides to re-enlist in the army, putting their relationship to the test. Romantic drama, with Channing Tatum and Amanda Seyfried.(n)

programme.title: There Will Be Blood
programme.desc: An oil prospector presents the public image of a caring family man while nurturing a murderous ambition to seize control of land and wealth at any cost. But his insatiable greed leads to a violent conflict with a young priest who is also intent on using the people and resources of an oil-rich town for his own ends. Paul Thomas Anderson's historical drama, starring an Oscar-winning Daniel Day-Lewis, with Paul Dano and Dillon Freasier.(n)

programme.title: Elizabeth: The Golden Age
programme.desc: Queen Elizabeth I faces threats at home and abroad, as Mary, Queen of Scots plots against her while the King of Spain builds a vast armada to undertake an invasion of England. Unable to reconcile her feelings for the dashing Sir Walter Raleigh with her duty to her country, the monarch engineers a romance between the courtier and one of her ladies-in-waiting. Historical drama sequel, with Cate Blanchett, Clive Owen, Geoffrey Rush and Samantha Morton.(n)

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: Ten interlinked stories of people searching for and finding love. While the newly elected, bachelor British prime minister is smitten by a junior staff member at 10 Downing Street, a heartbroken writer heads for France to get over a failed relationship, and a faded rock star aims to reinvent himself in time for Christmas. Richard Curtis's romantic comedy, with Hugh Grant, Martine McCutcheon, Emma Thompson, Alan Rickman, Colin Firth, Bill Nighy and Liam Neeson.(n)

programme.title: The Boy in the Striped Pyjamas
programme.desc: Bruno, a boy in Nazi Germany, moves to the country when his father is placed in charge of a concentration camp. While exploring the woods close to the facility's boundary, he spots a Jewish youngster being held there, and the two become friends - but Bruno remains innocently oblivious to the camp's true purpose. Drama, starring David Thewlis, Asa Butterfield and Jack Scanlon.(n)

programme.title: Dreamgirls
programme.desc: A 1960s singing trio are chosen to perform backing vocals for a popular performer - an event that launches the band on a successful career of their own. However, when the most attractive of the girls is picked as the face of the group, edging out the other two, personal rivalries begin to jeopardise their friendship. Musical drama, inspired by the rise to fame of Diana Ross and the Supremes, and starring Jamie Foxx, Beyonce Knowles, Eddie Murphy and an Oscar-winning Jennifer Hudson.(n)

programme.title: Grease
programme.desc: Rebellious American teenager Danny falls for innocent Australian girl Sandy during the summer holidays, but when he later finds out she is a new student at his school, he risks losing her love by trying to act cool in front of his friends. Romantic musical set in the 1950s, starring John Travolta, Olivia Newton-John, Stockard Channing, Jeff Conaway, Didi Conn and Sid Caesar.(n)

programme.title: Joker: Folie a Deux
programme.desc: Struggling with his dual identity, failed comedian Arthur Fleck meets the love of his life, Harleen 'Lee' Quinzel, while incarcerated at Arkham State Hospital. Musical thriller, starring Joaquin Phoenix, Lady Gaga and Brendan Gleeson.(n)

programme.title: Amadeus
programme.desc: Composer Antonio Salieri is a favoured artist in the court of Austrian emperor Joseph II, but he finds himself pushed aside in favour of Mozart. Salieri admires the younger maestro's music, but is incensed that someone so vulgar and obnoxious should be gifted with such talent. As jealousy consumes him, he plots his rival's downfall. Period drama, adapted by Peter Shaffer from his own play and starring F Murray Abraham and Tom Hulce.(n)

programme.title: Calvary
programme.desc: A priest in a rural Irish village receives a confession from a man who vows to kill him in one week as punishment for the Catholic Church's history of child abuse. The cleric spends his last seven days trying to put his community's affairs in order, but finds himself surrounded by people who harbour resentments of their own against the Church. Drama, starring Brendan Gleeson, Chris O'Dowd, Kelly Reilly, Aidan Gillen and Dylan Moran.(n)

programme.title: PS I Love You
programme.desc: Widowed Holly feels she cannot cope following the death of her husband. However, on her birthday, she receives a letter he wrote to her just before he died, encouraging her to live life to the full rather than languish in sorrow. This is just the first in a series of messages, each one sending her on wild misadventures and helping her to move on. Romantic drama based on Cecelia Ahern's novel, starring Hilary Swank, Gerard Butler and Lisa Kudrow.

programme.title: Birdy
programme.desc: A young soldier devastated by his nightmarish experiences in the Vietnam War is committed to an Army mental hospital. He comes to believe he is a bird, and dreams of taking his fantasy to the logical, ultimate conclusion - by learning to fly. Alan Parker's psychological drama, based on William Wharton's novel, with Matthew Modine, Nicolas Cage, John Harkins, Karen Young and Sandy Baron.

programme.title: True Grit
programme.desc: One-eyed, over-the-hill US Marshal Rooster Cogburn reluctantly agrees to help a girl track down her father's killer. The quest is complicated by a Texas Ranger, who is also on the murderer's trail, and a host of villains who have few qualms about disposing of the meddling youngster and her protector. Western, starring an Oscar-winning John Wayne alongside Jeff Corey, Kim Darby, Glen Campbell, Robert Duvall and Dennis Hopper.

programme.title: There Will Be Blood
programme.desc: An oil prospector presents the public image of a caring family man while nurturing a murderous ambition to seize control of land and wealth at any cost. But his insatiable greed leads to a violent conflict with a young priest who is also intent on using the people and resources of an oil-rich town for his own ends. Paul Thomas Anderson's historical drama, starring an Oscar-winning Daniel Day-Lewis, with Paul Dano and Dillon Freasier.

programme.title: Joker: Folie a Deux
programme.desc: Struggling with his dual identity, failed comedian Arthur Fleck meets the love of his life, Harleen 'Lee' Quinzel, while incarcerated at Arkham State Hospital. Musical thriller, starring Joaquin Phoenix, Lady Gaga and Brendan Gleeson.

programme.title: Dallas Buyers Club
programme.desc: A man diagnosed with HIV and given 30 days to live discovers that many treatments for his condition are not available in the US. With the aid of a transsexual Aids patient, he sets up a scheme to smuggle the drugs into the country and distribute them to those in need. Fact-based drama, starring Oscar winners Matthew McConaughey and Jared Leto, with Jennifer Garner and Steve Zahn.

programme.title: Exhibiting Forgiveness
programme.desc: An artist's rise to success is scuppered by an unexpected visit from his estranged father, a recovering addict desperate to reconcile. Writer/director Titus Kaphar's drama, starring André Holland and John Earl Jelks.

programme.title: Jackie
programme.desc: Following the assassination of her husband, President John F Kennedy, Jacqueline Kennedy battles with grief and trauma to regain her faith, console her children, and define JFK's legacy. Director Pablo Larrain's Bafta-winning drama, starring Natalie Portman, Peter Sarsgaard and Greta Gerwig. Mica Levi provided the Oscar-nominated score.

programme.title: One Life
programme.desc: In the months leading up to the Second World War, a young London stockbroker attempts to rescue hundreds of predominantly Jewish children from Nazi-occupied Czechoslovakia. Fifty years later he comes to terms with the guilt and grief he carried with him for decades. Drama based on a true story, starring Anthony Hopkins, Lena Olin and Johnny Flynn.

programme.title: Dear John
programme.desc: A soldier falls in love with a student he meets while on two weeks' leave, and he promises to seek her out after completing his tour of duty. However, in the aftermath of the September 11 attacks, he decides to re-enlist in the army, putting their relationship to the test. Romantic drama, with Channing Tatum and Amanda Seyfried.

programme.title: Dreamgirls
programme.desc: A 1960s singing trio are chosen to perform backing vocals for a popular performer - an event that launches the band on a successful career of their own. However, when the most attractive of the girls is picked as the face of the group, edging out the other two, personal rivalries begin to jeopardise their friendship. Musical drama, inspired by the rise to fame of Diana Ross and the Supremes, and starring Jamie Foxx, Beyonce Knowles, Eddie Murphy and an Oscar-winning Jennifer Hudson.

programme.title: The Brutalist
programme.desc: When a couple flee Europe in 1947, their new lives in the US are changed by a strange client. Director Brady Corbet's drama, starring Adrien Brody, Felicity Jones, Guy Pearce and Joe Alwyn.

programme.title: The Fisher King
programme.desc: A radio DJ contemplates suicide after a listener embarks on a murderous rampage in response to one of his broadcasts. He is saved by a now-homeless former professor of medieval history, who encourages him to retrieve what he claims is the Holy Grail. When the DJ later learns that he is responsible for his saviour's misfortunes, he feels compelled to make amends. Terry Gilliam's comedy drama, with Robin Williams, Jeff Bridges, Amanda Plummer and Mercedes Ruehl.

programme.title: Elizabeth: The Golden Age
programme.desc: Queen Elizabeth I faces threats at home and abroad, as Mary, Queen of Scots plots against her while the King of Spain builds a vast armada to undertake an invasion of England. Unable to reconcile her feelings for the dashing Sir Walter Raleigh with her duty to her country, the monarch engineers a romance between the courtier and one of her ladies-in-waiting. Historical drama sequel, with Cate Blanchett, Clive Owen, Geoffrey Rush and Samantha Morton.

programme.title: PS I Love You
programme.desc: Widowed Holly feels she cannot cope following the death of her husband. However, on her birthday, she receives a letter he wrote to her just before he died, encouraging her to live life to the full rather than languish in sorrow. This is just the first in a series of messages, each one sending her on wild misadventures and helping her to move on. Romantic drama based on Cecelia Ahern's novel, starring Hilary Swank, Gerard Butler and Lisa Kudrow.

programme.title: The Danish Girl
programme.desc: Artist Gerda Wegener unveils a portrait of her husband Einar dressed as a woman in 1920s Copenhagen. Einar realises that the woman in the painting is his true identity, and decides to become one of the first people to undergo sex reassignment surgery. Period drama based on David Ebershoff's novel inspired by the true story of artist Lili Elbe, starring Eddie Redmayne and an Oscar-winning Alicia Vikander.

programme.title: The Boy in the Striped Pyjamas
programme.desc: Bruno, a boy in Nazi Germany, moves to the country when his father is placed in charge of a concentration camp. While exploring the woods close to the facility's boundary, he spots a Jewish youngster being held there, and the two become friends - but Bruno remains innocently oblivious to the camp's true purpose. Drama, starring David Thewlis, Asa Butterfield and Jack Scanlon.

programme.title: One Life
programme.desc: In the months leading up to the Second World War, a young London stockbroker attempts to rescue hundreds of predominantly Jewish children from Nazi-occupied Czechoslovakia. Fifty years later he comes to terms with the guilt and grief he carried with him for decades. Drama based on a true story, starring Anthony Hopkins, Lena Olin and Johnny Flynn.

programme.title: The Bridges at Toko-Ri
programme.desc: An American naval reserve pilot is called up for service in the Korean War, and must leave his family and civilian job as a lawyer. In command of a corps of naval pilots, he heads a bombing campaign on strategic Communist positions, but later comes to question the morality of the conflict. Adventure, starring William Holden, Grace Kelly, Fredric March and Mickey Rooney.

programme.title: Schindler's List
programme.desc: In German-occupied Poland during the Second World War, businessman and Nazi Party member Oskar Schindler is deeply affected when he witnesses the clearing of the Krakow Ghetto. He decides to try to save Jews destined for the concentration camps by employing them in his factory - an act of mercy made possible by a deal struck with a sadistic German commandant. Steven Spielberg's Oscar-winning drama, starring Liam Neeson, Ben Kingsley and Ralph Fiennes.

programme.title: Darkest Hour
programme.desc: May 1940. As the Nazis advance against Britain's European allies, newly elected prime minister Winston Churchill must decide whether to leave neighbouring countries to their fate, by striking a peace deal with Hitler, or fight on against terrifying odds for the greater good. Double Oscar and Bafta-winning period drama, starring Gary Oldman, Lily James and Kristin Scott Thomas.

programme.title: There Will Be Blood
programme.desc: An oil prospector presents the public image of a caring family man while nurturing a murderous ambition to seize control of land and wealth at any cost. But his insatiable greed leads to a violent conflict with a young priest who is also intent on using the people and resources of an oil-rich town for his own ends. Paul Thomas Anderson's historical drama, starring an Oscar-winning Daniel Day-Lewis, with Paul Dano and Dillon Freasier.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview - October 2025
programme.desc: Previews of the films now playing on Sky Cinema, plus other highlights showing on Sky.(c)

programme.title: Rob Peace
programme.desc: A young man is torn between his father's shadowed past and his own promising future. Raised by his devoted mother, Rob Peace risks everything he has worked for to free his imprisoned dad. Drama, starring Chiwetel Ejiofor, who also adapted Jeff Hobbs' book and directed, with Jay Will, Camila Cabello and Mary J Blige.

programme.title: Anatomy of a Murder
programme.desc: An Army officer is accused of murdering a bartender, whom he claims he killed because the man raped his wife. He turns to a tenacious lawyer to get him off the hook, but the attorney faces a challenge because the prosecution alleges the defendant killed the barman because he was having an affair with his wife. Otto Preminger's courtroom drama, starring James Stewart, Ben Gazzara, Lee Remick and Eve Arden.

programme.title: Schindler's List
programme.desc: In German-occupied Poland during the Second World War, businessman and Nazi Party member Oskar Schindler is deeply affected when he witnesses the clearing of the Krakow Ghetto. He decides to try to save Jews destined for the concentration camps by employing them in his factory - an act of mercy made possible by a deal struck with a sadistic German commandant. Steven Spielberg's Oscar-winning drama, starring Liam Neeson, Ben Kingsley and Ralph Fiennes.

programme.title: Ferrari
programme.desc: During the summer of 1957, ex-racecar driver Enzo Ferrari is in crisis. Bankruptcy stalks the company he and his wife, Laura, built from nothing a decade earlier. Their tempestuous marriage struggles with the mourning for one son and the acknowledgement of another. Attempting to secure their survival, he rolls the dice on one race - 1,000 miles across Italy, the iconic Mille Miglia. Director Michael Mann's drama, starring Adam Driver and Jack O'Connell.

programme.title: Dear John
programme.desc: A soldier falls in love with a student he meets while on two weeks' leave, and he promises to seek her out after completing his tour of duty. However, in the aftermath of the September 11 attacks, he decides to re-enlist in the army, putting their relationship to the test. Romantic drama, with Channing Tatum and Amanda Seyfried.

programme.title: Dreamgirls
programme.desc: A 1960s singing trio are chosen to perform backing vocals for a popular performer - an event that launches the band on a successful career of their own. However, when the most attractive of the girls is picked as the face of the group, edging out the other two, personal rivalries begin to jeopardise their friendship. Musical drama, inspired by the rise to fame of Diana Ross and the Supremes, and starring Jamie Foxx, Beyonce Knowles, Eddie Murphy and an Oscar-winning Jennifer Hudson.

programme.title: Mamma Mia!
programme.desc: A former member of a singing trio, now running a hotel on a Greek island, is reunited with her old bandmates for her daughter's wedding - but is surprised when three of her old flames also show up unexpectedly. The three men have been invited by the bride, who wants to find out which one of them is her father. Musical comedy, with a soundtrack of Abba songs, starring Meryl Streep, Pierce Brosnan, Julie Walters, Colin Firth, Stellan Skarsgard and Amanda Seyfried.

programme.title: Mamma Mia! Here We Go Again
programme.desc: It's five years since Sophie invited her three possible dads to her wedding, and now most of her family are reunited as she prepares for the grand reopening of the Hotel Bella Donna. Along the way, she learns more about her mother's past. Abba-themed musical sequel, starring Amanda Seyfried, Lily James, Pierce Brosnan, Cher and Andy Garcia.

programme.title: The Holiday
programme.desc: Two single women living on opposite sides of the Atlantic agree to exchange houses over the Christmas holidays. In their new surroundings, both women unexpectedly encounter prospective partners, but as the house swap draws to a close, difficult decisions have to be made about their blossoming relationships. Romantic comedy, starring Cameron Diaz, Kate Winslet, Jack Black, Jude Law and Eli Wallach.

programme.title: The Good Half
programme.desc: Returning home for his mother's funeral, Renn Wheeland forges new relationships and heals old ones as he faces his grief. Drama, starring Nick Jonas, David Arquette and Brittany Snow.

programme.title: True Grit
programme.desc: One-eyed, over-the-hill US Marshal Rooster Cogburn reluctantly agrees to help a girl track down her father's killer. The quest is complicated by a Texas Ranger, who is also on the murderer's trail, and a host of villains who have few qualms about disposing of the meddling youngster and her protector. Western, starring an Oscar-winning John Wayne alongside Jeff Corey, Kim Darby, Glen Campbell, Robert Duvall and Dennis Hopper.

programme.title: Bob Marley: One Love
programme.desc: In 1976, Jamaica is dangerously divided across political lines and musician Bob Marley vows to quell the violence by performing at the Smile Jamaica Concert. Two days before the high-profile gig, gunmen break into the singer's home, shooting Bob, his wife Rita and manager Don Taylor. Everyone survives and Marley moves to London with his entourage to begin work on the LP Exodus under Island Records supremo Chris Blackwell. Biographical drama, starring Kingsley Ben-Adir, Lashana Lynch and James Norton.(n)

programme.title: Lost in Translation
programme.desc: A lonely and past-his-prime American actor travels to Japan to film a commercial. During a depressing night in the hotel bar, he meets a spirited younger woman and the pair strike up a close friendship, exploring Tokyo and helping each other face the mundanities of everyday life. Sofia Coppola's comedy drama, starring Bill Murray, Scarlett Johansson and Giovanni Ribisi.(n)

programme.title: Dallas Buyers Club
programme.desc: A man diagnosed with HIV and given 30 days to live discovers that many treatments for his condition are not available in the US. programme.title: Die Alone
programme.desc: A young couple flee the city during a zombie outbreak, only to be involved in a car crash. When the man awakes, his girlfriend is missing, so he bands together with a rugged survivalist to find his partner - but he only has selected memories of what he has been through. Apocalypse drama, starring Carrie-Anne Moss, Douglas Smith, Frank Grillo and Kimberley-Sue Murray.(n)

programme.title: Code 3
programme.desc: On his final shift, a burned-out paramedic has to train his keen but inexperienced replacement. What begins as a routine night soon descends into a chaotic, citywide odyssey that tests their endurance. Co-writer/director Christopher Leone's action comedy, starring Rainn Wilson, Lil Rel Howery and Aimee Carrero.(n)

programme.title: Grow
programme.desc: Rivals pull every trick in the book to win a pumpkin-growing contest, but it remains to be seen whether farmer Dinah Little and her talented niece, Charlie, will come out on top. Comedy, starring Nick Frost, Golda Rosheuvel and Priya-Rose Brookwell.(n)

programme.title: Panda Plan
programme.desc: An international action superstar gets involved in a rescue operation of a beloved zoo panda named Hu Hu. Chinese comedy, starring Jackie Chan and Xiang Wei, with subtitles.(n)

programme.title: Bridget Jones: Mad About the Boy
programme.desc: Recently widowed Bridget enters the dating game once again, caught between her son's science teacher and a man 20 years her junior. Romantic comedy, starring Renee Zellweger, Mila Jankovic, Hugh Grant and Colin Firth.(n)

programme.title: Presence
programme.desc: A family become convinced they are not alone after moving into their new home in the suburbs. Steven Soderbergh's horror thriller, starring Lucy Liu, Chris Sullivan, Callina Liang and Eddy Maday.(n)

programme.title: The Stranger in My Home
programme.desc: A stranger's claim that a couple's 15-year-old daughter was switched at birth throws their perfect family into turmoil, unearthing shattering secrets. Drama, starring Sophia Bush, Chris Carmack and Amiah Miller.(n)

Hollow Man
programme.desc: Unhinged scientist Kevin Bacon steals a new invisibility serum and stalks his colleagues to conceal his crime. Dark sci-fi from the director of Robocop.

programme.title: Cinema List: Thrilling Thriller
programme.desc: Send your heart racing with these masterful thrillers creating tension so thick you could cut it, from 70s hit The China Syndrome to M Night Shyamalan's 2024 blockbuster Trap.

programme.title: Friday The 13th Part II
programme.desc: Jason Voorhees gets a taste for teen blood as the masked killer in the woods avenging his mother's murder. Gory follow-up to the slasher classic. Violence/flashing images.

programme.title: Friday The 13th Part III
programme.desc: A hockey-masked murderer takes revenge on an unlucky group of visitors to the Crystal Lake woods. Gory horror from the director of Lake Placid. Violence/flashing images.

programme.title: The Ring
programme.desc: Watch a mysterious video, and you die seven days later. Naomi Watts has a week to solve the puzzle, or be scared to death. Nerve-shredding horror hit. Contains violence.

programme.title: Psycho
programme.desc: Vince Vaughn is the motel keeper with a shocking secret in Gus Van Sant's remake of the terrifying Hitchcock classic. With Anne Heche and Julianne Moore. Violent scenes.

programme.title: Ouija
programme.desc: A group of friends open themselves up to a terrifying ordeal when they attempt to summon spirits through a Ouija board. Horror. Violence/mature themes/flashing images.

programme.title: Ouija: Origin Of Evil
programme.desc: When a Ouija board is introduced to a scam seance act it does far more than spice up a stale routine. Supernatural horror prequel with Elizabeth Reaser and Annalise Basso.

programme.title: The Invisible Man
programme.desc: A woman believes her abusive ex's suicide was faked. Can she prove she's still being hunted? Sci-fi horror with Elisabeth Moss.

programme.title: Zombieland
programme.desc: With America in the grip of a zombie apocalypse, Woody Harrelson and Jesse Eisenberg team up to survive. With Emma Stone. Violence/strong language.

programme.title: Cloverfield
programme.desc: A group of friends keep the cameras rolling as a skyscraper-sized monster rampages through Manhattan. Found-footage creature feature. Violence/mature themes.

programme.title: Nosferatu
programme.desc: A gothic tale of obsession between a haunted young woman and the terrifying vampire infatuated with her, causing untold horror in its wake.

programme.title: Psycho
programme.desc: Vince Vaughn is the motel keeper with a shocking secret in Gus Van Sant's remake of the terrifying Hitchcock classic. With Anne Heche and Julianne Moore. Violent scenes.

programme.title: Bram Stoker's Dracula
programme.desc: Oscar-winning take on the vampire legend, with Gary Oldman as the famous bloodsucker driven to London by passion. Strong language/violence/sex.

programme.title: Die Alone
programme.desc: A man with amnesia teams up with a tough survivalist during a zombie-like outbreak. Together, they navigate dangers and search for the amnesiac's missing girlfriend.

programme.title: The Collector
programme.desc: A man kidnaps a woman and holds her hostage just for the pleasure of having her there. Classic thriller.

programme.title: Night Swim
programme.desc: An unsuspecting family is terrorised by the dark secret from their new house's past, facing a malevolent force in their pool. Horror thriller.

programme.title: Hollow Man
programme.desc: Unhinged scientist Kevin Bacon steals a new invisibility serum and stalks his colleagues to conceal his crime. Dark sci-fi from the director of Robocop.

programme.title: Hollow Man
programme.desc: Unhinged scientist Kevin Bacon steals a new invisibility serum and stalks his colleagues to conceal his crime. Dark sci-fi from the director of Robocop.

programme.title: Cinema List: Thrilling Thriller
programme.desc: Send your heart racing with these masterful thrillers creating tension so thick you could cut it, from 70s hit The China Syndrome to M Night Shyamalan's 2024 blockbuster Trap.

programme.title: Friday The 13th Part II
programme.desc: Jason Voorhees gets a taste for teen blood as the masked killer in the woods avenging his mother's murder. Gory follow-up to the slasher classic. Violence/flashing images.

programme.title: Friday The 13th Part III
programme.desc: A hockey-masked murderer takes revenge on an unlucky group of visitors to the Crystal Lake woods. Gory horror from the director of Lake Placid. Violence/flashing images.

programme.title: The Ring
programme.desc: Watch a mysterious video, and you die seven days later. Naomi Watts has a week to solve the puzzle, or be scared to death. Nerve-shredding horror hit. Contains violence.

programme.title: Psycho
programme.desc: Vince Vaughn is the motel keeper with a shocking secret in Gus Van Sant's remake of the terrifying Hitchcock classic. With Anne Heche and Julianne Moore. Violent scenes.

programme.title: Ouija
programme.desc: A group of friends open themselves up to a terrifying ordeal when they attempt to summon spirits through a Ouija board. Horror. Violence/mature themes/flashing images.

programme.title: Ouija: Origin Of Evil
programme.desc: When a Ouija board is introduced to a scam seance act it does far more than spice up a stale routine. Supernatural horror prequel with Elizabeth Reaser and Annalise Basso.

programme.title: The Invisible Man
programme.desc: A woman believes her abusive ex's suicide was faked. Can she prove she's still being hunted? Sci-fi horror with Elisabeth Moss.

programme.title: Zombieland
programme.desc: With America in the grip of a zombie apocalypse, Woody Harrelson and Jesse Eisenberg team up to survive. With Emma Stone. Violence/strong language.

programme.title: Cloverfield
programme.desc: A group of friends keep the cameras rolling as a skyscraper-sized monster rampages through Manhattan. Found-footage creature feature. Violence/mature themes.

programme.title: Nosferatu
programme.desc: A gothic tale of obsession between a haunted young woman and the terrifying vampire infatuated with her, causing untold horror in its wake.

programme.title: Psycho
programme.desc: Vince Vaughn is the motel keeper with a shocking secret in Gus Van Sant's remake of the terrifying Hitchcock classic. With Anne Heche and Julianne Moore. Violent scenes.

programme.title: Bram Stoker's Dracula
programme.desc: Oscar-winning take on the vampire legend, with Gary Oldman as the famous bloodsucker driven to London by passion. Strong language/violence/sex.

programme.title: Die Alone
programme.desc: A man with amnesia teams up with a tough survivalist during a zombie-like outbreak. Together, they navigate dangers and search for the amnesiac's missing girlfriend.

programme.title: The Collector
programme.desc: A man kidnaps a woman and holds her hostage just for the pleasure of having her there. Classic thriller.

programme.title: Night Swim
programme.desc: An unsuspecting family is terrorised by the dark secret from their new house's past, facing a malevolent force in their pool. Horror thriller.

programme.title: Madame Web
programme.desc: Thirty years after her scientist mother died whilst giving birth in the Peruvian Amazon, New York paramedic Cassandra 'Cassie' Webb saves lives without forming any emotional attachments besides her level-headed work partner, Ben. A routine call-out almost ends in tragedy and Cassie experiences disorienting visions which suggest she is predisposed to glimpse the future and subtly alter the course o

programme.title: Venom: The Last Dance
programme.desc: Journalist Eddie Brock and symbiote partner-in-crime Venom are lying low in Mexico City, on the run for the apparent murder of detective Patrick Mulligan. The cop and his bonded entity, Toxin, are actually alive at the Imperium symbiote containment programme, beneath the Area 51 US Air Force facility in the Nevada desert. Knull, the symbiotes' immortal creator, dispatches hunters to locate Venom's

programme.title: Spider-Man
programme.desc: A clumsy teenager develops superhuman powers after a genetically engineered spider bites him. At first his fantastic skills delight him, but his elation is severely tempered by a family tragedy, prompting him to dedicate his talents to combating evil. However, he faces a baptism of fire in the form of crazed villain the Green Goblin. Comic-book superhero adventure, with Tobey Maguire, Kirsten Duns

programme.title: Spider-Man 2
programme.desc: Peter Parker continues his fight for justice, but unrequited love and personal worries take their toll and he is tempted to abandon his web-slinging alter ego. However, the arrival of deadly new bad guy Doctor Octopus plunges him into a race against time to save New York. Comic-book adventure sequel, with Tobey Maguire, Kirsten Dunst, Alfred Molina, James Franco and Rosemary Harris.

programme.title: Spider-Man 3
programme.desc: A sinister alien parasite brings out the web-slinging hero's darker side, filling him with thoughts of revenge on his uncle's murderer, the shape-shifting Sandman. Meanwhile, he also has to contend with the challenge of his best friend following in his father's villainous footsteps - and a jealous rival developing superpowers of his own. Superhero sequel, with Tobey Maguire, Kirsten Dunst and Jame

programme.title: The Amazing Spider-Man
programme.desc: A gifted teenager investigates the secrets hidden in his dead parents' past, leading him to a mysterious corporation and an incident that imbues him with superhuman powers. A personal tragedy drives him to use his new-found abilities to fight crime, and he is soon drawn into a deadly battle against a former colleague of his father, who has undergone a devastating transformation of his own. programme.title: Over the Hedge
programme.desc: A raccoon trickster is fretting about his debt to a fearsome bear when he stumbles on some animals waking in the woods after their winter nap. Spotting the chance to solve his problem, the raccoon dupes the gullible creatures into stealing food from a nearby suburb so he can give it to the bear - but they fail to realise they will soon be at the mercy of a vermin exterminator. Animated comedy, wit

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania
programme.desc: Dracula opens a luxury resort for monsters, to provide a refuge from terrified humans. His cosy sanctuary is disrupted when a normal man unwittingly checks in, and the situation is complicated when the unwanted guest takes a liking to the count's daughter. Animated comedy, with the voices of Adam Sandler and Andy Samberg.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 2
programme.desc: Dracula is worried that his half-human grandson is not showing any vampiric tendencies, so enlists the help of his fellow monsters in showing the youngster how it is done. The count is shocked to receive an unwelcome visit from his own father, who does not approve of his son's tolerance of humans. Animated comedy, with the voices of Adam Sandler and Andy Samberg.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 3: A Monster Vacation
programme.desc: Count Dracula and company participate in a cruise for sea-loving monsters, unaware that their boat is being commandeered by the monster-hating Van Helsing family. Animated sequel, featuring the voices of Adam Sandler, Andy Samberg and Selena Gomez.

programme.title: Aquaman and the Lost Kingdom
programme.desc: The underwater kingdom of Atlantis's fate hangs in the balance when ruthless mercenary David Kane, aka Black Manta, attempts to avenge his father's death at the hands of Aquaman by wielding a mythical trident. Fantasy adventure, starring Jason Momoa, Yahya Abdul-Mateen II, Patrick Wilson, Dolph Lundgren, Nicole Kidman and Amber Heard.

programme.title: Sinners

programme.title: The Substance
programme.desc: Fading actress Elisabeth Sparkle becomes distressed when her chauvinistic boss fires her from her aerobics show. She soon injects herself with a mysterious serum that promises a younger, better version of herself, but things go horribly wrong.

programme.title: Task
programme.desc: With help from an eyewitness, Tom and his team inch closer to breaking the case; Perry pays Maeve a visit, while Robbie puts his plan in motion; later, Tom follows a lead that takes him down a dangerous path.

programme.title: Shame
programme.desc: Successful and handsome New Yorker Brandon (Michael Fassbender) seems to live an ordinary life, but he hides a terrible secret behind his mask of normalcy: Brandon is a sex addict. His constant need for gratification numbs him to just about everything else. But, when Sissy (Carey Mulligan), Brandon's needy sister, unexpectedly blows into town, crashes at his apartment and invades his privacy, Bran

programme.title: The Mummy
programme.desc: Nick Morton is a soldier of fortune who plunders ancient sites for timeless artifacts and sells them to the highest bidder. programme.title: Seen & Heard: the History of Black Television
programme.desc: Detailing decades of cultural shifts in television, with prominent Black voices sharing stories of their journeys, inspirations, and insights into their work and the industry.

programme.desc: In what was once North America, the Capitol of Panem maintains its hold on its 12 districts by forcing them each to select a boy and a girl, called Tributes, to compete in a nationally televised event called the Hunger Games. programme.title: Warfare
programme.desc: The harrowing true story of a U.S. Navy SEAL platoon surveillance mission gone dangerously wrong.

programme.title: Cleaner
programme.desc: Hoping to expose corruption, radical activists take 300 hostages at an energy company's annual gala in a high-rise building. Their cause soon gets hijacked by an extremist within their ranks who's ready to kill everyone. It's now up to a former soldier who works as a window cleaner to save the hostages trapped inside, including her younger brother.

programme.title: Sing Sing
programme.desc: A man is imprisoned at Sing Sing for a crime he didn't commit. When joined by a wary outsider, he finds purpose in staging an original comedy with a theater group of other incarcerated men.

programme.title: Stonewall
programme.desc: Kicked out by his parents, a gay teenager (Jeremy Irvine) leaves small-town Indiana for New York's Greenwich Village, where growing discrimination against the LGBT community leads to riots on June 28, 1969.

programme.title: On Becoming a Guinea Fowl
programme.desc: On an empty road in the middle of the night, Shula stumbles across the body of her uncle. As the funeral unfolds, the cousins unveil the buried secrets of their Zambian family in a vibrant reckoning with the lies we tell ourselves.

programme.title: Look Into My Eyes
programme.desc: A group of New York City psychics conducts deeply intimate readings for their clients, revealing a kaleidoscope of loneliness, connection and healing.

programme.title: All Eyez on Me
programme.desc: The true and untold story of prolific rapper, actor, poet and activist Tupac Shakur (Demetrius Shipp Jr.), from his early days in New York to his status as one of the world's most recognized and influential voices. Against all odds, Shakur's raw talent, powerful lyrics and revolutionary mindset establish him as a cultural icon whose legacy continues to grow long after his death.

programme.title: Task
programme.desc: Forced back into the field after a family tragedy, special agent Tom Brandis leads a new task force investigating a string of robberies.

programme.title: Task

programme.title: Task
programme.desc: As Cliff and Robbie look for a buyer, Aleah and Lizzie question Peaches' former co-workers; Tom and Grasso pursue a lead.

programme.title: Task

programme.title: Task

programme.title: Brian Banks

programme.title: The Iron Claw
programme.desc: The true story of the Von Erich brothers, who, through tragedy and triumph, under the shadow of their domineering father and coach, seek epic immortality on the biggest stage in sports.

programme.title: Logan
programme.desc: In the near future, a weary Logan (Hugh Jackman) cares for an ailing Professor X (Patrick Stewart) at a remote outpost on the Mexican border. His plan to hide from the outside world gets upended when he meets a young mutant (Dafne Keen) who is very much like him. Logan must now protect the girl and battle the dark forces that want to capture her.

programme.title: Kong: Skull Island
programme.desc: Scientists, soldiers and adventurers unite to explore a mythical, uncharted island in the Pacific Ocean. Cut off from everything they know, they venture into the domain of the mighty Kong, igniting the ultimate battle between man and nature. As their mission of discovery soon becomes one of survival, they must fight to escape from a primal world where humanity does not belong.

programme.title: Rizo
programme.desc: An Afro Latina struggles with her identity as she navigates the Hollywood machine.

programme.title: The Shining
programme.desc: Jack Torrance (Jack Nicholson) becomes winter caretaker at the isolated Overlook Hotel in Colorado, hoping to cure his writer's block. programme.title: Batman

As their mission of discovery soon becomes one of survival, they must fight to escape from a primal world where humanity does not belong.
